data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schwarzfeld, Marla D., Sperling, Felix A. H. (2014): Species delimitation using morphology, morphometrics, and molecules: definition of the Ophionscutellaris Thomson species group, with descriptions of six new species (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae). ZooKeys 462: 59-114, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.462.8229, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.462.8229
